```{r include = F}

library(flipbookr)
library(tidyverse)
library(magick)
library(tidyverse)
library(ggplot2)
library(xaringan)
library(xaringanthemer)
library(sysfonts)
library(showtext)

```

---
##Let's begin with a basic rotate
```{r princess, echo = F}

pic <- image_read("princess.png") %>% 
  image_scale("300")
pic

```

---

```{r}
image_rotate(pic, 45)
```
---

#A bit more
```{r}
image_rotate(pic, 90)
```
---
#Or just flip it!

```{r}

image_flip(pic)

```

---
# You can also add color! 


```{r}

image_fill(pic, "pink", point = "+100+200", fuzz = 20)

```

---

#And crop your image 
```{r}

image_crop(pic, "100x200+50")

```
---

---

```{r, echo = F}

circle <- image_read("circle.png")
waldo <- image_read("waldo.jpg") %>% 
  image_scale("5000")
waldo


```

---

```{r, echo = F}

circle <- image_read("circle.png") %>% 
  image_scale("200")
star <- image_read("star.png") %>% 
  image_scale("200")
waldo <- image_read("waldo.jpg") %>% 
  image_scale("5000")
waldo


```



---

##You can add images on top of others
```{r, echo = F}

image_composite(image_scale(waldo, "x1000"), star, offset = "+180+200")

```
